content: =Welcome to Cyborg Unicorn Blog= This is a demonstration of '''CyborgWiki''' markup in action! ==Text Formatting== You can use '''bold text''' for emphasis, and combine it with other formatting. ==Lists== Here's what you can do: * Create unordered lists * Add multiple items * Keep things organized Or use numbered lists: # First point # Second point # Third point ==Links and Images== External links work like this: [https://github.com|Visit GitHub] - - - - ==Code Blocks== You can include code: function hello() { console.log("Hello World!"); } ==Tables== {| !! Header 1 !! Header 2 !! Header 3 |- | Row 1 Col 1 || Row 1 Col 2 || Row 1 Col 3 |- | Row 2 Col 1 || Row 2 Col 2 || Row 2 Col 3 |} ===Sub-subheading=== You can nest headings for better organization. That's the power of lightweight wiki markup - '''no heavy WYSIWYG editor needed!'''
